name: Rays
description:
Warning: This game contains flashing lights.

I recommend you play the project on the scratch website to avoid bugs. 

Visit the project on scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/325400799/

Instructions:

Use arrow keys to move.

To select a mode move the player into the mode.

Press 9 to activate/deactivate rainbow mode.

Bugs:

Ray appearing on the menu after game

The last letter on the difficulties is not appearing properly
